trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer" /> that can process X.509 certificate reference types.
trans-unit.target: 表示可處理 X.509 憑證參考型別的<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer" /> 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509DataSecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509DataSecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 位於金鑰識別項子句之開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified reader is positioned at an <see langword="<ds:X509Data>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的讀取器是否位在 <see langword="<ds:X509Data>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reader is referring to an <see langword="<ds:X509Data>" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器參考 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="<ds:X509Data>" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be serialized by this handler.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示這個處理常式是否能夠序列化指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key identifier clause is supported by this handler; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個處理常式支援金鑰識別項子句，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The supported key identifier clause types are:
trans-unit.target: 支援的金鑰識別碼子句類型包括：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityKeyIdentifierClause" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityKeyIdentifierClause" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause to read.
trans-unit.target: 位於要讀取之金鑰識別項子句開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes a key identifier clause from XML by using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 讀取器，從 XML 還原序列化金鑰識別項子句。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause that was deserialized from the XML or <see langword="null" /> if a key identifier clause could not be read.
trans-unit.target: 從 XML 還原序列化的金鑰識別碼子句，如果無法讀取金鑰識別碼子句，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509DataSecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method reads `<ds:X509IssuerSerial>`, `<ds:X509SKI>`, and `<ds:X509Certificate>` elements and returns the first one found as a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, or a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509DataSecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer.ReadKeyIdentifierClause%2A>方法會讀取`<ds:X509IssuerSerial>`， `<ds:X509SKI>`，和`<ds:X509Certificate>`項目，並傳回第一個找到做為<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>、 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>，或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause>。

trans-unit.source: If one of these elements is not found under the `<ds:X509Data>` element, the method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一個元素下找不到`<ds:X509Data>`項目，則方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is not positioned at a <see langword="<ds:X509Data>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 並不是放置在 <see langword="<ds:X509Data>" /> 項目上。

trans-unit.source: (The <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509DataSecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method returns <see langword="false" />.)
trans-unit.target: (<see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509DataSecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> 方法會傳回 <see langword="false" />)。

trans-unit.source: The XML writer to use to serialize the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 用來序列化金鑰識別項子句的 XML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 序列化指定的金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: The supported key identifier clause types are:
trans-unit.target: 支援的金鑰識別碼子句類型包括：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="securityKeyIdentifierClause" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityKeyIdentifierClause" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityKeyIdentifierClause" /> is not a supported clause type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityKeyIdentifierClause" /> 不是支援的子句型別。
